directions.step:
***Do not use metal spoon ***Do not refrigerate dough!!
day 1 -- Get starter and do nothing day 2 -- Stir once each day with wooden spoon day 3 -- Stir once each day with wooden spoon day 4 -- Stir once each day with wooden spoon day 5 -- Add 1 cup flour, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup milk and stir day 6 -- Stir once each day with wooden spoon day 7 -- Stir once each day with wooden spoon day 8 -- Stir once each day with wooden spoon day 9 ~- Stir once each day with wooden spoon day 10 - Add 1 cup flour, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup milk and stir. pour into containers of 1 cup each and give to 3 friends with copy of recipe (or 2 friends and keep 1 start for yourself)
To the remainder add:
2/3 cup oil 1 1/4 tsp baking powder 3 eggs 1/2 tsp baking soda 2 cups flour 1/2 tsp salt 1 cup sugar 2 tsp vanilla 2 tsp cinnamon
Pour into 2 well greased and sugared loaf pans. Bake 40 to 50 min. at 350 degrees. Cool 10 minutes before removing from pan. The bread may be frozen for a later date. (note the starter)
